br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.object2d

Class FixedObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Widget
        • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Image
          • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.object2d.FixedObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Layout
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Arrow, Deck2D, EnergyBar, HandBackground, HandCard, LifeBar, MenuButton

    public abstract class FixedObject
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Image
    Abstract class inherited by all fixed objects on the screen, that is, the objects which remain on the same horizontal position relative to the camera. However, they may be, optionally, draggable by the player.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FixedObject

        public FixedObject(int initialX)
        Standard constructor. It assumes that the object will never be moved, even with user interaction.
        Parameters:
        initialX -

      • FixedObject

        public FixedObject(int initialX,
           boolean draggable)
        Alternative constructor for objects which the player may interact with.
        Parameters:
        draggable - Indicates whether the object is draggable or not.

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage st,
        int cameraInitialX)
        This should be called whenever the camera is updated. The object's position is adjusted accordingly, unless the object is draggable.
        Parameters:
        st - The stage which contains the camera.
        cameraInitialX - The initial position of the camera on the screen.
